params.cursor: The index at which to start.
params.perPage: How many records should be returned at most.

returns._0: A `address[]` list of values at most `perPage` big.
returns._1: A `uint256` index to the next page.

params.cursor: The index at which to start.
params.perPage: How many records should be returned at most.

returns._0: A `address[]` list of values at most `perPage` big.
returns._1: A `uint256` index to the next page.

FastRegistered(address).notice: Emited when a new FAST is registered.

FastUnregistered(address).notice: Emited when a FAST is removed from the Issuer contract.

paginateDetailedFasts(uint256,uint256).notice: Paginates the FAST diamonds registered with this Issuer based on a starting cursor and        a number of records per page. It returns rich details for each FAST diamond.

paginateDetailedFastsInGroup(string,uint.notice: Paginates the FAST diamonds registered with this Issuer based on a group, starting cursor and a        number of records per page. It returns rich details for each FAST diamond.
